# default

**Type Property**

The default collision group for objects.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: CollisionGroup
```

## Discussion

If no [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionFilter] is assigned to an entity, that entity will be part of this default collision group.

## Standard collision groups

- **all**: The collision group that represents all groups.
- **sceneUnderstanding**: The default collision group for scene-understanding meshes.
